snippet: Talks aimed at creating one of the world’s largest marine reserves in the waters off Antarctica ended in failure in the face of resistance from Russia, China and Ukraine, delegates said.
abstract: International negotiations aimed at creating one of world's largest marine reserves in waters off Antarctica end in failure in face of objections from Russia, China and Ukraine; environmentalists describe failed talks as major setback for world's oceans.
lead_paragraph: Talks aimed at creating one of the world’s largest marine reserves in the waters off Antarctica ended in failure in the face of resistance from Russia, China and Ukraine, delegates said.

headline.main: Talks on Antarctic Marine Reserve Fail to Reach Agreement
headline.print_headline: Talks on Antarctic Marine Reserve Fail to Reach Agreement

keywords.value: Commission for the Conservation of Antarctic Marine Living Resources
keywords.name: organizations
